title: The determination of 11 sulfonamide antibiotics in water and foods by developing a N-rich magnetic covalent organic framework combined with ultra-high performance liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21318-21327
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02530J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ling Ma, Yue Gu, Liqiang Guo, Ke Wang
A type of magnetic COF with exposed N-containing groups acting as adsorption sites was designed and synthesized. The magnetic COF was combined with UPLC-MS/MS to establish a rapid method for the determination of 11 SAs residues in samples.
